markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Menagerie Dung Sweeper](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=57)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Absalom and Starstone Isle

</column>

Whether you washed warrior beasts below the Irorium’s arena floor or tended to the mutated animals of a Puddle sideshow, you are experienced with all manner of weird wildlife.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill, and the [Animal Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Train Animal](/Feats.aspx?ID=856) skill feat.
name: Menagerie Dung Sweeper
